comments.comment:
Lawyer Nagananda Kodituwakku
is the only individual who has the courage to say what he is saying. Most of
the current politicians are going to rob the country again and the people and
the country suffers. He has prepared a new constitution and that will be put to
the people before the election. If people vote to elect him, then he has got a
mandate to introduce the new constitution. Some of the proposals are
eligibility to contest up to degree level education, reduce the number of members
of parliament to around 60, smaller cabinet of 20, etc. We need to have
complete change from the present corrupt political system in order to get rid
of the rogue politicians who have robbed the country, eliminate corruption,
make the judiciary independent, rule of law, make importers pay the normal duty
when importing goods to the country, people who are liable for income tax to pay
it including business people, lawyers, doctors politicians etc. ¬†At the
moment Sri Lanka is borrowing money as most people do not pay their income
taxes. People need to educate the masses in the villages not to vote for rogue
politicians. Rule of law is paramount for a country to develop and there is no
rule of law in Sri Lanka as politicians and influential people never get
punished because corrupt politicians intervene to prevent them being punished..
comments.author: Hugh
